mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.product_id, a.sale_property_key_id, a.sale_property_key_name, b.id sale_property_value_id, b.sale_property_value_name, if(c.sku_id IS NULL ,0,1) is_selected FROM product_sale_property_key a INNER JOIN product_sale_property_value b ON a.product_id = b.product_id AND a.sale_property_key_id = b.sale_property_key_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_property_value c ON b.id = c.sale_property_value_id AND sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE a.product_id = #{productId} order by b.sale_property_key_id, b.id
